tool_description:
Supported output/input formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, SVG, TIFF
The Bulk Image Converter API is a simple image processing API that can be used to convert images from one format to another, resize/crop, and overlay images. The returned images are base64 encoded string urls that can be used in a web page or saved to disk.
name: Bulk Image Converter
title: Bulk Image Converter

api_list.name: Single Convert

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Options: jpeg, png, webp, gif, svg, tiff
